package hello;

public class hello {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		hello word = new hello();
		word.name(5,5);   ///arguments or i/p parameter passind 

	}
	void name(int a, int b){   ///(container )   ///method signature 
		int c = a+b;
		System.out.print(c);
	}

}
